plaque.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a piece of flat metal, wood, or stone with writing on it, used as a prize in a competition or attached to a building to remind people of an event or person
plaque.translation[0].definitions[0].not: commemorative plaque (=a plaque to help people remember something important)
plaque.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The teamâ€™s coach was given a plaque.
plaque.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a harmful substance which forms on your teeth, which bacteria can live and breed in
